NumberSPServers.description: Number of SP Servers to Deploy

NumberSQLServers.description: Number of SQL Servers to Deploy

administratorAccount.description: Provide the Local Admin User Name for each new server

vmSizeSP.description: Define a Azure VM Size for SP Servers. Basic_A2 is ok for testing purposes only

vmSizeSQL.description: Define a Azure VM Size for SQL Servers. Basic_A2 is ok for testing purposes only

domainJoinUserName.description: Provide the Domain Join User Name with no domain prefix

domainJoinPassword.description: Define the Domain Join User Password

domainJoinOU.description: Define the OU to add new accounts/users into

domainName.description: Define the Dmaon Forest Name e.g. mydomain.com

domainNetBiosName.description: Define the Domain NetBios Name e.g mydomain

SQLMediaContainerName.description: Provide the Storage Account Folder Name where the SQL Media is stored

SPMediaContainerName.description: Provide the Storage Account Folder Name where the SP2016 Media is stored

StorageAccountName.description: Provide the Storage Account Name where the Media and Scripts are stored

StorageAccountKey.description: Provide the key to access the Storage Account

sqlServiceUserName.description: Provide the User Name which will run the SQL Server Services

sqlServicePassword.description: Provide the Password for the account which will run the SQL Server Services

spInstallUserName.description: Provide the User Name which will run the Installation

spInstallPassword.description: Provide the Password for the Account which will run the Installation

spFarmUserName.description: Provide the User Name which will be the Farm Admin

spFarmPassword.description: Provide the Password for the Account which will be the Farm Admin

spWebUserName.description: Provide the User Name which will run the SP Web Application Pools

spWebPassword.description: Provide the Password for the Account which will run the SP Web Application Pools

spSvcUserName.description: Provide the User Name which will run the SP Service Application Pools

spSvcPassword.description: Provide the Password for the Account which will run the SP Service Application Pools

virtualNetworkName.description: Provide the name of the Virtual Network to join the servers onto
